title: GORGEOUS UNIT IN BENTLEY BAY!!
posting_body: ['Come and live in one of South Beach’s most exclusive luxury buildings with spectacular floor-to-ceiling views of Biscayne Bay and downtown Miami skyline.', 'Enjoy outdoor living & picturesque sunsets from the large balcony as well as endless views from the interior of the unit.', 'This condo has custom kitchen cabinets with marble countertops, a spacious bathroom with euro glass shower and a separate tub/jacuzzi, ample closet space and in- unit washer and dryer.', 'Located right across from South Beach’s new exclusive Canopy Park.', 'Walking distance to South Beach’s best dining and shopping experiences.', 'Enjoy the boardwalk to South beach marina and famous South Pointe Park.', 'Bentley Bay is a full-service building offering 24-hour concierge service, valet, pool, jacuzzi, and state-of-the-art gym', 'all units are one year lease min!', 'credit score close to 700 or higher required, proof of income 2,5 greater than rent price, first month + last month + security deposit to move in!', 'Dilya Taveras', 'Equity Realty', 'TEXT :', 'show contact info']
